brand_context.imagery_style: High contrast, natural light, textural focus, partial human presence
brand_context.illustration_style: Line-based, high density, single color, technical/architectural quality
brand_context.graphic_elements: Subtle grid patterns, circles/arcs (compass constructions), paper texture, 1px lines, no rounded corners
brand_context.product_essence: A living inquiry field that trains humans to recognize, refine, and consciously author the meaning systems they operate within

prompts.prompt: A grounded architectural scene, deep blue-black ink tones, philosophical journal on dark stone surface, aged gold accent highlights, natural lighting, high contrast, textural paper, minimalist, no soft edges, atemporal craft aesthetic
prompts.negative_prompt: ethereal, floating, cosmic, soft, warm colors, nurturing, tech startup, mystical, occult, stock photo
